backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled CRUD for schools, teachers, trainings, reviews, user profiles, and blog posts using maps and lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and dark-mode overrides for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout wrapper, query client, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Component gating admin access with Internet Identity login, sign-out handling, and fallback UI when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Tabbed admin dashboard rendering CRUD sections for schools, teachers, trainings, and reviews.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/R: Displays all reviews with school names and provides deletion via admin hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/S: Provides full CRUD management for schools with forms, dialogs, and validation using admin school hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/T: Lists teachers and allows creating and deleting them, including selecting associated schools.
Manages training programs with creation, validation of hours, and deletion tied to schools.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyLinkB: A button that copies a given or current URL to the clipboard and shows success feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/SocialLin: Renders a row of icon links filtered to only valid URLs.
frontend/src/components/directory/Direct: Static marketing sections explaining how the directory works and why users should choose it.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Displays a school card with image, name, location, training badges, teacher count, and a details button.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Renders a list of teacher cards with initials avatar and specialization, or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with about text, navigation links, social links, and copyright plus attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation links, theme toggle, and responsive menu including social links.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Shows an About section with a default or provided description of the school.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Exports a list of default FAQ items with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Displays FAQ items in an accordion within a card layout.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Provides a photo gallery grid with a modal viewer and default images if none supplied.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolInq: Inquiry form for contacting a school with validation, submission simulation, and success message.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Displays a Google Maps embed and link for a school location, with fallback messaging when no location is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolPro: Renders a large banner image with the school name, location, and optional inquiry button.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Fetches and displays school reviews, calculates averages, and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Lists training courses with hours, estimated days, descriptions, and actions to view curriculum or inquire.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Extracts a YouTube video ID and displays an embedded player or a fallback message if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Fetches and shows similar schools with loading and empty states using SchoolCard components.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines default social media link configurations with labels, icons, and empty hrefs.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminReviews: Provides hooks to load all school reviews for admin and a placeholder mutation for deleting reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSchools: Provides React Query hooks for admins to list, create, update, and delete schools using the backend actor with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTeacher: Implements admin hooks to fetch teachers across all schools and to create or delete teachers with proper backend calls and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTrainin: Offers admin hooks to retrieve trainings across all schools and to create or delete trainings while managing errors and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on user identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Defines hooks to fetch all blog posts or a single blog post through the actor with error logging and conditional fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches a school's teachers and trainings for card display using React Query with conditional loading and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Retrieves full school details, including teachers and trainings, with coordinated queries and loading/error aggregation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Handles loading and submitting school reviews through query and mutation hooks with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches schools and optionally filters them by training hours, including loading associated trainings when needed.
Retrieves schools matching a given country, state, and city, with backend failure logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Finds schools similar to a given one by comparing training hour overlaps and returns top matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Loads a school and training by ID and returns combined loading and error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Logs structured diagnostic data for backend call failures.
frontend/src/lib/blogContent.ts: Provides helpers for generating excerpts, splitting content, and selecting display excerpts.
frontend/src/lib/locationFormat.ts: Formats structured locations, sanitizes segments, and checks for presence of structured data.
frontend/src/lib/locationRoutes.ts: Builds URL paths and breadcrumbs for structured locations with encoding/decoding utilities.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Deterministically maps school IDs to thumbnail images using a simple hash.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, features, and informational content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Wraps the admin dashboard with an access gate based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of blog posts with loading, error, and empty states, linking each post to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Loads and renders a full blog post with paragraphs, featured image, and navigation back to the blog list, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows static contact information and a non-functional placeholder contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a directory of yoga schools with filtering by training hours, banner hero section, and scroll-to filters/results behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LocationListingPage.t: Lists schools filtered by decoded country, state, and city parameters with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Renders detailed school information including banner, about section, courses, teachers, media, reviews, and inquiry form, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Static informational page offering submit and claim school options with disabled buttons and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: Fetches and displays detailed training curriculum info with loading, error states, and structured school data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture notes, known issues, and versioned state.
